Player Join Event.name: Player Join Event
Player Join Event.description: Called when a player joins the server.

Player Quit Event.name: Player Quit Event
Player Quit Event.description: Called when a player leaves the server.
Player Quit Event.examples:
on quit:
    broadcast "%player% has left the server"

Send Message.name: Send Message
Send Message.description: Sends a message to a player.

Player Name.name: Player Name
Player Name.description: Returns the name of a player.

Custom Value.name: Custom Value
Custom Value.description: Returns a custom value for the player.
Custom Value.examples: set {_value} to custom value of player
